messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group with 15 scholars. Amir is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Puja. Wim is connected to Wei, Kim, Puja, and Pam. Raj is connected to Nisha, Ian, Sara, and Kim. Jing is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Max. Wei is connected to Kim, Puja, and Pam. Nisha is connected to Ian, Sara, and Max. Reza is connected to Moin, and Pari. Kim is connected to Pam. Ian is connected to Sara, and Max. Moin is connected to Pari. Puja is connected to Pam. Sara is connected to Max. You have been told that Kim is donating 50 books and Max is donating 10 books. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person who is donating the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify the person who is donating the maximum number of books. In this case, Kim is donating 50 books and Max is donating 10 books. Therefore, Kim is the person donating the maximum number of books.

Step 2: Identify the connections of Amir. Amir is directly connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Puja.

Step 3: Check if Kim is directly connected to Amir. Kim is not directly connected to Amir.

Step 4: Identify the connections of the scholars directly connected to Amir. Reza is connected to Moin and Pari, Moin is connected to Pari, Pari has no further connections, and Puja is connected to Pam.

Step 5: Check if Kim is directly connected to any of the scholars connected to Amir. Kim is not directly connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, or Puja.

Step 6: Identify the connections of the scholars directly connected to the scholars connected to Amir. Moin is connected to Pari, Pari has no further connections, Pam is connected to Kim.

Step 7: Check if Kim is directly connected to any of the scholars connected to the scholars connected to Amir. Kim is directly connected to Pam.

Step 8: Trace back the connection from Kim to Amir. Kim is connected to Pam, Pam is connected to Puja, and Puja is connected to Amir.

Answer: Amir, Puja, Pam, Kim.

Amir and Puja had a disagreement and now no longer connected to each other, and now Jing has an instant connection portal, through which he can connect you to any scholar, but one at a time. This means that once you connect with Jing, then you can immediately connect with any other scholar. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person who is donating the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify the person who is donating the maximum number of books. This is still Kim, who is donating 50 books.

Step 2: Identify the connections of Amir. After the disagreement, Amir is directly connected to Reza, Moin, and Pari.

Step 3: Check if Kim is directly connected to Amir. Kim is not directly connected to Amir.

Step 4: Identify the connections of the scholars directly connected to Amir. Reza is connected to Moin and Pari, Moin is connected to Pari, and Pari has no further connections.

Step 5: Check if Kim is directly connected to any of the scholars connected to Amir. Kim is not directly connected to Reza, Moin, or Pari.

Step 6: Identify the connections of the scholars directly connected to the scholars connected to Amir. Moin is connected to Pari, and Pari has no further connections.

Step 7: Check if Kim is directly connected to any of the scholars connected to the scholars connected to Amir. Kim is not directly connected to Moin or Pari.

Step 8: Since Amir cannot reach Kim through his direct connections or their connections, use the instant connection portal of Jing. 

Step 9: From Jing, connect directly to Kim, as Jing can connect you to any scholar.

Step 10: Trace back the connection from Kim to Amir. Kim is connected to Jing, and Jing is connected to Amir.

Answer: Amir, Jing, Kim.
